Hi, my name is Jivko Andreev, an Inspiring Frontend Developer that loves making websites!

I work mostly with frontend technologies, but i do have some backend knowledge. I am also very good at making the websites visible to the world using the Search Engine Optimization. I have worked with the Agile methodolodgy and SCRUM project management, so i can quickly adapt in a team with busy enviornment.

I'm specialized in

Frontend Development

Designing and developing user-friendly websites is truly a passion of mine and I constantly seek new technologies to stay up-to-date and improve myself to get the best possible results.

Responsive Web Design

People use various devices to surf the internet, so it's very important that the layout of our website adapts and changes based on the screen size of the device, providing the best user experience.

SEO

Even if you have the best website in the world, if nobody knows it exists, it's as good as having no website at all! That's where the Search Engine Optimization comes into place.

Interaction Design

Interaction design is all about the interaction between the user and the product. Usually i prefer more simplistic and elegant approach for creating an engaging and intuitive digital experience.

Agile Development

I've mostly worked using the Agile methodology in my past projects, and in particular, SCRUM. Scrum concentrates specifically on how to manage tasks within a team-based development enviornment.

Team Environment

Having worked in an agile enviornment taught me how to manage projects as a team player, offering my skills where they are needed and trying to keep the team morale as high as possible.
